name: UPaperTerrainComponent
doc:
The terrain visualization component for an associated spline component.
This takes a 2D terrain material and instances sprite geometry along the spline path.

TerrainMaterial: The terrain material to apply to this component (set of rules for which sprites are used on different surfaces or the interior)
RandomSeed: Random seed used for choosing which spline meshes to use.
ReparamStepsPerSegment: Number of steps per spline segment to place in the reparameterization table
CollisionThickness: The extrusion thickness of collision geometry when using a 3D collision domain
TerrainColor: The color of the terrain (passed to the sprite material as a vertex color)
